files.patch:
@@ -66,2 +66,2 @@
-  # The '\#' <=> '\ 'dance is needed to keep values with space in them connected.
-  COMMAND_LINE_VARIABLES := $(subst \#,\ , $(call reverse, $(subst \ ,\#,$(MAKEOVERRIDES))))
+  # The '§' <=> '\ 'dance is needed to keep values with space in them connected.
+  COMMAND_LINE_VARIABLES := $(subst §,\ , $(call reverse, $(subst \ ,§,$(MAKEOVERRIDES))))
@@ -71,3 +71,3 @@
-  # The '\#' <=> '\ 'dance is needed to keep values with space in them connected.
-  USER_MAKE_VARS := $(subst \#,\ , $(filter-out $(addsuffix =%, $(INIT_CONTROL_VARIABLES)), \
-      $(subst \ ,\#,$(MAKEOVERRIDES))))
+  # The '§' <=> '\ 'dance is needed to keep values with space in them connected.
+  USER_MAKE_VARS := $(subst §,\ , $(filter-out $(addsuffix =%, $(INIT_CONTROL_VARIABLES)), \
+      $(subst \ ,§,$(MAKEOVERRIDES))))
